Articles.Content: It's Unopen Hill

*\*Pulls out shotgun\**

It's now an open hill.

\*Locks Hill\*

No, and this hill is now closed.![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")

*\*Pulls out another shotgun\**

No, it's still open.

\*Destroys the hill with a few falling N1 Rockets\*

That should do it.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

My 3 July 1969 Baikonur Cosmodrome Site 110 Replica Land

Rocket Launches from site, first men on Mars!

Famous Baikonur Cosmodrome

There is a misunderstanding about the name.

A Baker's dozen of my Hills.

I perform a topological inversion on the world, and there's now a single island with a single hill on it in the middle of an infinite sea with infinite depth (yes I like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") ).

Then I save the game and edit *persistent.sfs* so the following parameters can't be changed:

oceanDepth=inf,

maxIslandNum=1,

maxHillPerIsland=1,

canDestroyHill=false,

canTerraformPlanet=false,

canMovePlanets=false.

And I delete all the save files other than *persistent.sfs*, which I burn on the hard disk of the computer. No one can undo this, because I emptied the trash before leaving.

My island-hill, alone on the sea

The sphere is inverted.

Your island-trench

Submarine.

My Subnautica hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-08T14:14:43Z" title="01/08/2022 02:14  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 8, 2022</time> by Admiral Fluffy**
  
Ninja’d

Destroyer.

My Destroyer with a pile of Submarine Debris Hill
I throw a snowball at you.   I throw another snowball at you.   10^10000(I throw a snowball at you).     My snowball hill

It melts.

Snowball Pool

Since 10^10000 snowballs were thrown, the pool is big enough to be an ocean.

Ocean of snowballs

And it is too warm for the snowballs, so they melt.

Ocean.
INFINITE ocean. There's a Sea Kraken. It emerges. It's like a hill. My Kraken-hill

I have a nuclear submarine. They have nuclear missiles.

My dead kraken hill.

Dead Kraken is sent to Bop with a Kerbal X.  Hence how it got there.

Dead Deep Space Kraken (on Bop)

A massive asteroid crashes into Kerbin's sea and after the world wide tidal wave has finished, half of it rises out of the sea to form.

MY Asteroid Mountain.

The asteroid gravity is too weak. The mountain flies up and drifts away.

Drifting Mountain

One of the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center"><abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr></abbr>’s  anti aircraft missile launchers noticed the flying hill and nukes it out of the sky. I go to the crash site and claim a random piece of debris from the previous asteroidm-hill (now no longer floating for no reason whatsoever) as my hill.

**MY SLIGHTLY RADIOACTIVE HILL**

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-09T08:41:20Z" title="01/09/2022 08:41  AM" data-short="2 yr">January 9, 2022</time> by Space Kerbalisation Tech**

I destroy the debris of the asteroid and claim a random hill as my hill.

My hill

The rollback maintenance procedure restores the previously destroyed hill.

Rolled Back Radioactive Hill

The rollback maintenance procedure is accused of Flat Kerbinist and it's undone.

My hill in the plains

Your hill is too plain to be in top-1 of hills.

Failed Hill
